Story Editing: How to Assess and Fix Your First Draft

by Kristina Stanley

Price: 27 US$

Get invitation

About

We all get excited when we type “The End” on our first draft, but before you share your story with others, you owe it to yourself to tell the best possible story.

Don't miss your chance to learn story editing from someone who trains story editors. Kristina Stanley will share what she’s learned from working with structural editors around the world and show you how to apply that knowledge to your story.

Date: Wed, Sep 9, 2020

Time: 10:00 PM EEST

Location: Kigali, Rwanda
